short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Turbo charge the new tab screen with explosive power.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Replaces the new tab screen with additional functionality.

- A simple widget for taking notes. 
- All your bookmarks, searchable.
- An event countdown for upcoming exciting events.
